com.here.msdkui.routing

Class ThemeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.msdkui.routing.ThemeUtil
  • Deprecated. 
    This class will be removed in version 1.4.0

    public final class ThemeUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains utility methods that allow easier usage of theme attributes in code.
    See Also:

      • getColor

        public static int getColor(android.content.Context context,
                           int colorAttribute)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a color value specified by the given theme attribute.
        Parameters:
        context - the required Context.
        colorAttribute - A theme attribute such as R.attr.colorBackground.
        Returns:
